0.1.0.name: wordpress/wp-editor-widget
0.1.0.description: This plugin adds a rich text widget where the content is edited using the standard WordPress visual editor which most users already are familiar with. It uses the WP core function wp_editor() without adding a custom post type post for each widget making the widget quicker and simpler to edit.
